languages.text: "Конечно... конечно, сделаю! Все организую в лучшем виде! Только помогите, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g} прошу..."

traits.locale_text: "Конечно... конечно, сделаю! Все организую в лучшем виде! Только помогите, Троном прошу..."

languages.text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."
languages.original_text: "Конечно... конечно, сделаю! Все организую в лучшем виде! Только помогите, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g} прошу..."

traits.locale_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for Throne's sake..."

"Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for Throne's sake..."
"Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

languages.text: “没问题……没问题，绝对没问题！我一定会令您满意的！只要您帮我这个忙，看在{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的份上……”
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: “没问题……没问题，绝对没问题！我一定会令您满意的！只要您帮我这个忙，看在{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的份上……”

languages.text: «Claro... ¡Claro, lo haré! ¡Quedará satisfech{mf|o|a} con los resultados! Pero ayúdeme, por amor del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}...».
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: «Claro... ¡Claro, lo haré! ¡Quedará satisfech{mf|o|a} con los resultados! Pero ayúdeme, por amor del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}...».

languages.text: 「もちろん…もちろんやります！迅速に手配いたします！助けてくださるなら{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}の名にかけてなんでもやります…」
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん…もちろんやります！迅速に手配いたします！助けてくださるなら{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}の名にかけてなんでもやります…」

languages.text: "Natürlich ... natürlich, wird erledigt! Ihr werdet mit dem Ergebnis sehr zufrieden sein! Helft mir einfach, beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} ..."
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich ... natürlich, wird erledigt! Ihr werdet mit dem Ergebnis sehr zufrieden sein! Helft mir einfach, beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} ..."

languages.text: « Bien sûr... Bien sûr, ce sera fait ! Vous serez pleinement {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, je vous le garantis ! Mais pour l'amour du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, aidez-moi... »
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr... Bien sûr, ce sera fait ! Vous serez pleinement {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, je vous le garantis ! Mais pour l'amour du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, aidez-moi... »

languages.text: "Tabii tabii. Lafı bile olmaz! Bütün belgeleri eksiksiz hazırlarım size! Yeter ki {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} aşkına yardım edin!"
languages.original_text: "Of course... of course, will do! You'll be most pleased with the results! Just help me, for {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}'s sake..."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki... Pek tabii ki! Dediklerinizi harfiyen uygulayacağım! Yeter ki bana yardım edin, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} aşkına!"
